text: Vadym Yuriyovych Alpatov (; born 22 April 1980) is a former Ukrainian football player. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:MFC Mykolaiv players Category:FC Okzhetpes players Category:Expatriate footballers in Kazakhstan Category:Association football midfielders
title: Vadym Alpatov
